duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in patient care responsibilities as assigned, including performing venipuncture, EKGs, managing patient flow, and assisting patients with various needs.
Assist physicians with procedures, take vital signs, relay instructions to patients/families, and provide necessary information.
Fulfill clerical responsibilities, receive patient records, obtain lab/x-ray reports and hospital notes, and complete forms as needed.
Enter orders into EMR system, prepare prescription refill requests, and manage medical supplies inventory.
Maintain examination rooms and instruments in accordance with proper sterilization techniques, and ensuring a safe and healthy work environment.
Assist in maintaining medical charts, scheduling surgeries/procedures, and performing phlebotomy duties as required.
Update patient demographic and insurance information, and perform verification and pre-certification for procedures.

education_certification.credential: Certificate of Medical Assistant training or equivalent
Heartsaver Certification from American Heart Association and/or BCLS
